text: What is your infrastructure as code strategy?
example_answer: Terraform for cloud infrastructure, Ansible for configuration

text: What cloud platforms will you use?
help_text: e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP, multi-cloud, on-premise
example_answer: AWS primary, GCP for ML workloads, managed services

text: What is your containerization and orchestration strategy?
help_text: e.g., Docker, Kubernetes, ECS, managed container services
example_answer: Docker containers, EKS for Kubernetes orchestration

text: What is your deployment pipeline and CI/CD strategy?
help_text: e.g., GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, ArgoCD
example_answer: GitHub Actions for CI, ArgoCD for continuous deployment

text: What is your release strategy and rollback plan?
help_text: e.g., blue-green, canary, rolling, feature flags
example_answer: Canary deployments with feature flags, instant rollback

text: What monitoring and observability tools will you use?
help_text: e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, DataDog, New Relic, ELK
example_answer: Prometheus for metrics, ELK for logs, Grafana for dashboards

text: What is your alerting and incident response strategy?
help_text: e.g., alert thresholds, escalation policies, on-call rotation

text: What is your database strategy and backup plan?
help_text: e.g., managed databases, replication, backup frequency, RTO/RPO
example_answer: RDS with multi-AZ, daily backups, RTO < 1h

text: What is your disaster recovery and business continuity plan?
help_text: e.g., multi-region, hot standby, disaster recovery testing

text: What is your logging and log management strategy?
help_text: e.g., centralized logging, retention policy, structured logging

text: What is your infrastructure scaling and auto-scaling strategy?
help_text: e.g., auto-scaling groups, load balancing, scaling policies
example_answer: Auto-scaling groups with target tracking, 20% headroom

text: What is your DevOps team structure and responsibilities?
help_text: e.g., platform team, SRE team, embedded ops engineers
example_answer: 3-person platform team, 1 SRE per service team

text: What is your cost optimization and FinOps strategy?
help_text: e.g., reserved instances, spot instances, cost monitoring
example_answer: 50% reserved instances, spot for dev/test, monthly review

text: What is your knowledge management and documentation strategy?
help_text: e.g., wiki, runbooks, architecture diagrams, decision logs
example_answer: GitHub wiki, runbooks for common operations, ADRs
